t=input()

for _ in range (t):
    gasten=input()
    aankomst=map(int,raw_input().split())
    vertrek=map(int,raw_input().split())
    hotel=[0 for _ in range(1001)]
    for i in range(gasten):
        for j in range(aankomst[i],vertrek[i]):
            hotel[j]+=1
    print max(hotel)
